name: High Low Cards
description:
Feeling lucky today? Then dare to play this fun and simple card game to test your luck!

This app is all about guessing what could be the next card. Is it higher or lower?

Simple and classic hi low game is now here with a twist of a realistic casino ambiance! This is soooo easy to play! So dare your luck now and build up your casino chips!!

4 step easy game direction:

Step 1: Choose your bet and confirm
Step 2: Pick your lucky card!
Step 3: Guess what the next card would be! Is it high or low? Is it red or black? And then whatever your guts decide, confirm it!!
Step 4: Now.. find out if you are lucky enough to win the game or just need more chance to try again and fire up your luck!

Just a hint! The more you bet, the more chips you could win! :)

This game features:

» Super fun app!
» All time classic card game action!
» Amazing and fun app which is great for all ages!
» iOS8, iPad Air, iPhone 6 and 6 Plus ready!
» Beautiful graphics!
» Cooool sounds!
» Addictive classic card game fun with a twist!!!

Download now and see how much luck you can get!

Note: This app contains the ability to purchase optional content using real money. If you don't want this feature, disable payment features in your device in-app purchases settings.

If you love this game, please support it by leaving a review in the app store. Thanks for your help we really appreciate it!
